Title: Relates to providing identification cards to inmates upon release from incarceration
Summary: Directs the commissioner of corrections and community supervision, in consultation with the commissioner of motor vehicles and the federal bureau of prisons, to develop a program to provide an identification card to each inmate upon the release of such inmate from custody.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to providing identification cards to inmates upon release from incarceration
